name: The Legend of Prisma
description:
A 1-bit roguelike action top-down game where the neon colors dictate your actions.

This game was heavily inspired by Hades and the Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening.

Defeat your foes in random chambers, acquire different power ups to get stronger. Survive as long as you can.

This is my first game ever released, feedback is more than welcomed.

Thanks to Canary Games for most sprites I used in this project.

Also, thanks to Abstraction for the music : http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

I highly recommend using a gamepad!

*** XBOX controller (X-Input) compatible 

***Keyboard and mouse commands:

ASDW or Direction keys: MOVEMENT

Mouse Left Button: Attack

Mouse Right Button: Shoot

Mouse Wheel: Change color

Space Bar: Dodge/roll

E key: Action/interact

Q key: Bomb

***This game was a submission to "Amaze Me Game Jam"
